body.name: 10 in 1 Convection Toaster Oven Countertop, Knob with LED display SCR Precision Temperature Control 32QT/30L Ceramic Coating Cavity Double Glass Door, Brushed Stainless Steel
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【LARGE CAPACITY & VERSATILE TOASTER OVEN】- Stainless steel toaster oven, external dimensions are about 19.6"x15.8"x13.0". Interior size 13.8"x12.6"x10.5" , 30L/32QT large capacity toaster oven, can fit 6 slices of toast, 12" pizza, a whole chicken or a 9" x 12" baking pan. 10-in-1 functions are: toast, roast, bake, rotisserie, convection, broil, maxi bake (pizza), keep warm, slow cook and user customization.

【SPEEDY AND SAFE COOKING】- TAMARIT large toaster ovens countertop, 1400W, temperature range 85-450°F. Dual top and bottom heaters & digital control knobs for precise temperature control. Powerful fan reduces cooking time & ensures even hot air circulation throughout the air fryer oven. 360° rotating rotisserie set is perfect for roasting whole chickens. Double-layer tempered glass door provids thermal insulation, explosion resistance, and protection against scalding.

【DIGITAL TOASTER OVEN with TIMER 】- The convection oven comes equipped with LED display on the knob. The 3 LED display control knobs serves as both a setting keys and display screens, making it easy to control the temperature and cooking time. Toaster ovens countertop, SCR (silicon controlled rectifier) precision temperature control technology, includes a 120-minute timer knob & upper/down heater’s temperature setting knobs, allowing you to set precise cooking times and temperature.

【EASY CLEANING】- Countertop oven toasters feature a ceramic-coated cavity for easy cleaning. Includes six accessories: 1 enamel-coated baking tray, 1 oven wire rack, 1 tray handle, 1 slide-out crumb tray, 1 rotisserie holder, 1 rotisserie set. Removable crumb tray easily slides in and out from the bottom of the oven, all accessories can be detached and washed either in running water or in a dishwasher, making maintenance a breeze.

【AFTER SALES SERVICE】 - Before using our toaster oven grill combo for the first time, please read the instruction manual. TAMARIT electric convection toaster oven rated at 1400W, 120V AC, It is ETL certified for safety and quality assurance. We also offer a one-year worry-free refund policy and provide free lifetime customer service. If you encounter any issues with our ovens, please feel free to contact us. We guarantee a response within 24 hours. Trust in TAMARIT, we won't let you down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TAMARIT COUNTERTOP CONVECTION TOASTER OVEN TAMARIT convection toaster oven countertop, brushed stainless steel silver. TAMARIT digital control countertop convection toaster oven with grill, suitable for cooking breakfast, lunch and dinners, anytime other meals or snacks for family and parties. Ideal for fries, bake, pizza, bread, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more. All in one baking oven countertop can meet meals for a whole family at one time.

TAMARIT EXTRA LARGE CAPACITY & MULTIFUNCTIONAL CONVECTION TOASTER OVEN, Large toaster oven, external dimensions are about 19.6"x15.8"x13.0", interior dimensions are about 13.8"x12.6"x10.5", Inner capacity 32QT/30L toaster oven, with enough room for a 12" pizza, 6 slices bread, 4-6 lbs a whole chicken, 4-6 lbs steak, or a 9" x 12" baking pan. The all-in-one toaster machine can meet all your cooking and baking need.

EASY TO USE AND CLEAN TOASTER OVENS Toaster oven brushed stainless steel finish/ silver, ceramic-coated cavity for easy cleaning. 6 accessories included: 1x enamel-coated baking pan, 1x baking rack, 1x rack clamp, 1x rotisserie holder, 1x rotisserie set, and 1x crumb tray at the bottom of oven. All accessories can be detached and washed in running water or dishwasher safe. All these make clean-up and maintenance so easy.

TAMARIT ROTISSERIE CHICKEN TOASTER OVEN COUNTERTOP Electric family-sized toaster oven counter top, 1400W high powerful, heat fastly and evenly. With powerful convection fan interior to deliver hot air to every corner inside the bake oven, rotate the baking fork to fully penetrate the heat into the ingredients, perfect for rotisserie chicken, can make crispy/delious grilled chicken at home. EASY CONTROL/ADJUST HEATING TEMPERATURE AND COOKING TIME TAMARIT convection toaster oven, featuring a 120-minute timer and LED display on knobs, helpful for easy control on temperature and cooking time. When the food cooking finished as the target time you set, a bell rings 2 seconds for reminder and then the oven turn off automatically, ensuring the food never be overcooked or burned. STAINLESS STEEL COUNTERTOP, 6 SLICE OVEN Please refer to user manual before the first time use.TAMARIT large and multifunctional ovens & toasters, with 32QT/30L large interior capacity and ten-in-one functions. 3 LED display control knobs for adjusting top and down heaters' temperature and cooking time independently, and one 8-in-1 functions knob, can meet different cooking needs.
INDOOR CONVECTION TOASTER OVEN for KITCHEN makes cooking and baking simple, fast, convenient and funny.

Convection Toaster Oven Countertop Raclette Table Grill for 4-8 Indoor Raclette Tabletop Grill Large Korea BBQ Grill Stainless Steel Portable Raclette Cheese Grill Item Dimensions 19.5x16x13" 17.7x9.7x5.4'' 18.5*8.9*4.2'' 20.3*11*5.9'' 18.7*8.9*5.3'' Rated Power 1400W 1400W 1300W 1400W 1450W (1100+350W) Suitable for 4-10 4-8 4-8 4-8 4-8 Temperature Control & Adjust ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Easy to Use & Clean ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Accessories Dishwasher Safe ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This convection oven works flawlessly. It is absolutely fast at heating and holds temperature very well. It has a great fan installed in it and you can hear the fan running. It takes a matter of a couple minutes to heat up to 400 degrees with no issues. The over has several different settings to choose from depending on what it is your cooking. Included is a rack, tray and a rotisserie system. The system is very versatile and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ceramic coating is defective & function keys hard to read
reviews.reviewText: I am adding additional info on this item.It does work well after spending much time figuring out how to operate it and even more time contacting mfg. After using it for quick meals and making toast but not having it on for more than 10 to 12 minutes, I finally roasted a chicken in it. It turned out very well, but something happened to damage the ceramic coating on the bottom black pan. I contacted Amazon and all they could do is have me send it back and they'd give me a refund. All I want is a new black ceramic pan with no defects. For that reason, I am concerned of just how well the walls and top of the inside which are also ceramic will last. Also, I am adding the following in this edited review:In their product info on the warranty, it states: "We also offer a one-year worry-free refund policy and provide free lifetime customer service. If you encounter any issues with our ovens, please feel free to contact us. We guarantee a response within 24 hours. Trust in TAMARIT, we won't let you down."I did contact TAMARIT about the damaged bottom black tray and they didn't respond. So much for their warranty. Guess the old saying of "words are cheap" is true with this company. All I want is new black bottom tray. I hope they send a new pan to me so they can save face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size. Great even cook. Pretty light weight.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this oven. It's a good size. I used a wine bottle in the pics to give it some size perspective (don't try to cook a wine bottle!). I love the size because it allows us to cook a lot more items. Even though it's pretty large, it's still pretty light, which is great for storing it away when not in use. Not only has it been giving a nice even cook, but it gets things nice and crispy. It's quiet. I like the little handle feature to remove the baking tray. So far, I'm a big fan!
